description: Develop & use a range of advanced teaching skills & strategies. Consolidate competence & confidence in planning & teaching. Work within secondary practicum sites, actively engaging with issues confronting the school. Use creative solutions to address teaching & learning in health & physical education contexts.
restricted: BScApp(HMS-Ed); BHMS (Educ); BHSPE; BHSPE(Hon) students; or with permission by HMNS Head of School
